title: Theophilus
content: The person that Luke wrote his gospel and the book of Acts for. The name Theophilus means lover of God. What Luke wrote can help anyone who loves God. Luke might have used the name Theophilus to talk about another Christian. He might have done this to keep the personâ€™s name a secret to protect them. Luke called Theophilus most excellent. This might mean that Theophilus was an official of the Roman government.
